MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA5 & KA18 postcode areas of Cumnock, Auchinleck & Mauchline affecting properties at South Logan and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to broken equipment on our overhead line network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45pm on the 12th of February 2021.
